      • setHighScores

        public static void setHighScores(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> topScores)
        Updates the High scores on the GUI with those given as an ArrayList of an array of Strings.
        Only score, player name and date are displayed here although more information is received.
        Every ArrayList entry contains the following:
        [Game ID][Score][Player Name][Player 2 Name][Date Played]
        Parameters:
        topScores - ArrayList of String arrays containing SCORE, PLAYERNAME and DATE

      • setInteractions

        private static void setInteractions()
        Defines and implements all the interactions for the Reaction Game GUI
